Today, it is one of the world’s largest sweet-packaged food companies, with **over 35 iconic brands** sold in more than 170 countries. The Ferrero Group brings joy to people around the world with much-loved treats and snacks, including **Nutella®, Kinder®, Tic Tac® and Ferrero Rocher®**.
